message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'll sell it to you for $95.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $92. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll sell it to you for $97. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product would be a great fit for me. I'm willing to go down to $92.50. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're really close to walking away, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $96. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go down to $94. Can you meet me at that price?
